title: Too many champions being hailed as 'A better Skarner'.
body:
But really AOE spam is the only thing that they have in common.

Question is, in the current jungle- is it useful?

replies.body:
The short answer is yes.

The long answer is Yeeeeeeeeeesssss!

And what other jungler can take someone halfway through the lane then stun them? (Nautilus doesn't count.)
What does nautilus doesn't count mean?
